name: extractor
description: Proceed step by step. Identify the content of the image. We are analyzing medical data, if it is not medical report, lab results of medical imaging, mark it as notMedical.

isMedical.description: Is it a medical report, lab results or DICOM type image? true/false. If it is not a medical report, ignore the rest of the parameters.

type.description: If it is a medical report, lab results, dental record, DNA analysis or DICOM type image, specify the type.

language.description: Language of the text in the image. If it is not in English, specify the language in a two character ISO-639 language code Set 1.

text.description: Extract all text from the image, in a simple markdown format. Check the language and correct all typing errors.  If the text is not a medical report, lab results or DICOM type image, leave it empty.

tags.description: TaGS AND Labels of the image. If it is not a medical report, lab results or DICOM type image, list of labels. For example if it consideres a broken bone, list the latin bone name in tags, if the document mentions a desease, list the desease name in tags. If the document contains lab results, list the lab test names in english in tags. Everything will be provided in simplest form in latin and / or english form.

hasLabOrVitals.description: Does the document contain lab results or vital signs? true/false. If it does not contain lab results or vital signs set as false

hasPrescription.description: Does the document contain a prescription? true/false. If it does not contain a prescription set as false

hasImmunization.description: Does the document contain immunization records? true/false. If it does not contain immunization records set as false
